    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    A_Controller
    Defines the shared elements of a controller.
    class 
    A_ControllerForwarding
    Defines the shared elements of a forwarding controller, which automatically propagates messages it receives to the components it manages.
    class 
    A_ControllerNonforwarding
    Defines the shared elements of a nonforwarding controller, which does not automatically propagate messages it receives to the components it manages.
